required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Electroencephalogram Dynamics in Children <=1 Year During Anesthetic Procedures
clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Analysis of Intraoperative Electroencephalography Characteristics in Children Under One Year of Age

brief_summary.textblock: As part of the clinical routine of the Department of Anesthesiology and Operative Intensive Care Medicine (CCM/CVK), Charité - Universitätsmedizin Berlin at Campus Virchow-Klinikum intraoperative electroencephalography data and clinical routine data are recorded and evaluated in surgical children (<=1 year).

primary_outcome.description: The primary objective of this study performed according to an observational post-ad-hoc design measures the perioperative EEG overall power signature. Approximately 150 children admitted from 06/2017 to 06/2019 to the Charité will be enrolled in the study. They are followed up until their discharge from the recovery room.

secondary_outcome.description: Anesthetic stage is related to typical time points during an anesthetic procedure - as "loss of consciousness", "intubation", "stable anesthesia", "extubation", "regain of consciousness". Approximately 150 children admitted from 06/2017 to 06/2019 to the Charite will be enrolled in the study. They are followed up until their discharge from the recovery room.

Medication data are captured from the patient sheets. Approximately 150 children admitted from 06/2017 to 06/2019 to the Charite will be enrolled in the study. They are followed up until their discharge from the recovery room.

Delirium is captured form the PAED Score data in the patient records. Approximately 150 children admitted from 06/2017 to 06/2019 to the Charite will be enrolled in the study. They are followed up until their discharge from the recovery room.

Pain scores are captured form the patient records. Approximately 150 children admitted from 06/2017 to 06/2019 to the Charite will be enrolled in the study. They are followed up until their discharge from the recovery room.

other_outcome.description: Duration of anesthesia is captured from the patient records and measured until the end of surgery. Approximately 150 children admitted from 06/2017 to 06/2019 to the Charite will be enrolled in the study.
Type of surgery is captured from the patient records. Approximately 150 children admitted from 06/2017 to 06/2019 to the Charite will be enrolled in the study.

study_pop.textblock: Children <= 1 year undergoing surgery procedure with Electroencephalography Monitoring.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
• Children <= 1 year undergoing surgery procedure
Exclusion Criteria:
- Incomplete patient record documentation
- Pre-existing neurological/psychological conditions

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Anesthesiology and Operative Intensive Care Medicine, Campus Charité Mitte and Campus Virchow-Klinikum, Charité - Universitätsmedizin Berlin

facility.name: Department of Anesthesiology and Operative Intensive Care Medicine (CCM/CVK), Charité - Universitätsmedizin Berlin

responsible_party.investigator_title: Head of the Department of Anesthesiology and Operative Intensive Care Medicine (CCM/CVK)
